means: 演变，进化( evolve的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Language is constantly and gradually evolving.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言在不断地缓慢发展.

sentence.Network_en: Our galaxy is a continuously evolving system.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的星系是一个不断演化的星系.

sentence.Network_en: New inert gas data from terrestrial rocks has also raised other questions about the evolving earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 地球岩石中惰性气体的新资料,为我们提出了与演变中的地球有关的许多其它方面的问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Equipment and technology replacement is a continuous and evolving process ., 设备和工艺的更新换代是个连续而不断发展的过程.
evolving and closed loop feedback control of production in core enterprise under supply chain ., 供应链核心企业生产的推演与闭环反馈控制.
What opportunities will arise from evolving trends and global change ?, 什么机会将产生于不断变化的趋势与全球变化?
court case 诉讼evolving 展开的听写于：2012-5-15 | 正确率：77% |

list.abs: evaporator 蒸发器evolvent 渐开线，切展线examination ①检查②研究，分析
托福词汇表_百度文库 ... inhabit 栖息于，居住在 evolve 进化 evolution 进化.
人教版_高中英语_选修9单词 - 豆丁网 ... rot,vt. & vi. 腐烂；腐败 evolve,vt. 发展；进展；进化 evolution,n. 演变；进化.

entry.def: When animals or plants evolve, they gradually change and develop into different forms.

example.ex: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females...
example.tran: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

example.ex: Maize evolved from a wild grass in Mexico.
example.tran: 玉米是从墨西哥的一种野生禾本植物进化而来的。

entry.def: If something evolves or you evolve it, it gradually develops over a period of time into something different and usually more advanced.

example.ex: ...a tiny airline which eventually evolved into Pakistan International Airlines...
example.tran: 最终发展成巴基斯坦国际航空公司的一家小型航空公司

example.ex: Popular music evolved from folk songs...
example.tran: 流行音乐从民歌演变而来。

auth_sentence.content: Some species are still evolving, others are not.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some species are still evolving, others are not.

auth_sentence.content: We are evolving whether we want to or not.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are evolving whether we want to or not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are evolving whether we want to or not.

auth_sentence.content: Technology is just evolving too quickly, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Technology is just evolving too quickly, he said.
